name: The Tongue Tie
description:
This amazing little accessory can give you the well groomed and classic look that just reeks of success. You will always stand out, and be remembered when you wear a NeoMetro Necktie!
It can replace a necklace or another piece of jewelery.

They come in almost any fabric, the choices are endless.

Custom orders are always welcome.

Colors available atm,
In silky: Dusty rose, Colonial blue, vibrant green, cream, bright pink, Pacific blue {not pictured}, and black.

In velvet: black or chocolate brown.

In cotton: burgundy, dusty rose, baby pink, indigo, midnight blue, dark blue, periwinkle, pacific blue and black.

In flannel, black and bright red.

Also, brown ultra suede, Faux grained black leather, washed denim. 
Please specify a choice when ordering and provide your neck size in inches. Most ties are made to order.
~~~~~~~The pictured Tongue Tie is in black velvet~~~~~~~~

options.name: see description for color and fabric choices

name: The Collar Point Tie
description:
This is the unisex necktie that gave NeoMetro its start!

This striking accessory is pure simplicity. It is at the same time elegant and daring; subtle yet memorable.
Perfect for the well groomed professional who likes to show that creativity and daring are valuable assets.

The collar point tie is suitable for both men and women and can be made in the same fabrics as the Tongue Tie.

Most ties are made to order so specify your fabric choices, and neck measurement in inches please.

The Tie shown is made in burgundy cotton on an olive green mans shirt
~~~Colors available atm,
In silky: Dusty rose, Colonial blue, vibrant green, cream, bright pink, Pacific blue {not pictured}, and black.

In velvet: black or chocolate brown.

In cotton: burgundy, dusty rose, baby pink, indigo, midnight blue, dark blue, periwinkle, pacific blue and black.

In flannel, black and bright red.

Also, brown ultra suede, Faux grained black leather, washed denim. 

Please specify a choice when ordering and provide your neck size in inches. Most ties are made to order.~~~
